Most recently, I had to wait an hour for a table for two when the hostess let us know that it would be only be 30 minutes. Unfortunately, that is unacceptable. I am hoping that they will get it together eventually as this is the closest location to me, but until then I will just stick with the The Cheesecake Factory at Washington Square Mall.

Had an amazing birthday lunch with my momma! The server, whose name I forget but whose face I will always remember, was wonderful! Clearly very experienced (with serving and with the Cheesecake Factory menu), he took his time with us, helped us figure out what we wanted, chatted in a super friendly fashion, and generally just made the lunch that much better. We both had the Bow tie pasta with chicken and roasted garlic cream sauce-Amazing! Will most definitely order that again! Got two slices of cheesecake to go- I am sure they will be great as well, but for now my tummy is full of delicious pasta. Overall, a terrific experience. Now, this is a BUSY location with mostly two and four top tables. You will not get in and out of this place fast. We were there close to the opening and it was still busy, so I imagine that during the dinner rush it will be kinda insane. If you are ordering from grub hub, pick things you would enjoy eating when cooled....cause the food isn&#39;t going to get to you fast and hot. If you are there during the dinner rush, just sit back and relax. Even lunch was a good hour, and dinner I could see lasting two. I would go back here in a second, and I will definitely order this through Grub hub in the future as well. And again, a super high five to my server- you deserve a raise!

First time going to Cheesecake Factory!  Very nice service.  Lots of choices, something for everyone.  Workers trained very well.  Typical Cheesecake Factory with the lots of cheesecakes.  Waiter gives a recommendation for which Cheesecake also.

Good portions.. a little pricey for what it is but great atmosphere.. one thing is we went on a opening day and the trainers were literally staring at us eating.. was very awkward.. standing right next to me and giggling every time I told my wife a joke.. weird but the food was great lol

I haven&#39;t been seated yet and I&#39;m already disappointed when I arrived with a party of 9 they told me it would be two hours but I had to &#34;stand aside to talk to the manager&#34; it took him another 20 minutes to come tell me it was actually a 3 hour wait because they don&#39;t put me in the system until he talks to me ... I said ok well we are here and it my daughters 13th birthday and he was very rude and said IF I wanted to wait it would be 3 hours ..it was his attitude that put me off ..and why wouldn&#39;t they actually start trying to make room when I arrived ? I&#39;ll update if it&#39;s worth it...

My family of five tried your new establishment today for lunch. We were quoted a 50 minute wait time &amp; chose to do so. We were seated within that time. We ordered our food &amp; our 3 kids food. Theirs arrived in under 20 minutes (Mac &amp; cheese) but ours took over 30 minutes and our kids were completely finished by then. We ordered the Chicken &amp; Waffles Benedict and the Fish Tacos. The syrup that came with the waffles was straight oil. We waited for some normal syrup. The hollandaise sauce was disgusting &amp; inedible! The manager removed it from our bill. When we ordered the Fish Tacos we specifically asked if they had cabbage or lettuce on them. It was not an ingredient in the description but common. Our waiter said no. They arrived with red cabbage. I removed it but along with it came most of the sauce &amp; avocado. The fish was soggy (maybe thawed too quickly) &amp; tasteless. They were not good &amp; I have been burping fish all afternoon. I DO NOT recommend eating at this location until their wait staff had been properly trained on the menu and their kitchen staff can figure out how to decently fry fish &amp; anticipate the amount of customers. The wait was way too long for a seat &amp; way too long for food &amp; very disappointing once it arrived. Our waiter was friendly &amp; apologetic but for their prices I want good food!
I&#39;ve always liked this restaurant, but once the one in clackamas opened up I got a shrimp pasta, unfortunately the shrimp still had that translucent color and was cold to the bite.

Do not, under any circumstances get delivery from this location. The order my wife made was missing items from the food that was delivered and then we were missing our entire dessert order. The manager was beyond rude when called to ask about how this situation might be rectified, actually hanging up on my wife. I don&#39;t care how good their food may or may not be, the customer service is non existent. We will not be using this establishment again.

Awesome service! Awesome food! Awesome atmosphere! I&#39;m so glad they finally came to this side of town.  I had a great &#34;skinny&#34; salad and then indulged on the fresh banana cream cheese cake....yummmm! Love this place! Go...you won&#39;t regret it!

My 9 year old son and I went for dinner tonight. We checked in at 5pm and were told there was an hour wait. No problem, we walked around the mall and returned at 6pm. The waitress (Sarah L.) seated us and came back to take our orders. It was 45 minutes later and we had not received our food and not a word from our waitress. I noticed a couple of tables of people that were seated after us had already received their food. I waved Sarah down and asked her to check on our order. She came back 5 minutes later with my son&#39;s kid menu pepperoni pizza and said they were still working on my burger order. After my son finished his dinner another 20 minutes had now gone by. Sarah never checked on us or gave any updates. I asked for our bill and she said they were still working on my order. I told her to please bring the check. The manager then came by and very quickly said my order had been delivered to another table. (He did comp the burger so I wasn&#39;t charged for it). Our server should have been honest about what happened and should have come back to give us updates. I ended up getting my meal to go. The burger was over cooked and tasted burnt, the bottom bun was completely wet and soggy and the fries were cold. This is a $14 burger on the menu, I would expect much better quality.  I was really looking forward to having a Cheesecake Factory restaurant close by. I normally would give a restaurant a second chance but due to bad service and poor food quality I won&#39;t be back.
